org.openimaj.data

Class RandomSampleDataSource<DATATYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.data.AbstractDataSource<DATATYPE>
      • org.openimaj.data.IndexedViewDataSource<DATATYPE>
        • org.openimaj.data.RandomSampleDataSource<DATATYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    DATATYPE - the data type which can be returned
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<DATATYPE>, DataSource<DATATYPE>

    public class RandomSampleDataSource<DATATYPE>
extends IndexedViewDataSource<DATATYPE>
    This DataSource provides randomly sampled view over another DataSource.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomSampleDataSource(DataSource<DATATYPE> dataSource, double proportion)
      Construct the view over the given DataSource such that it has the given proportion of items from the original.
      RandomSampleDataSource(DataSource<DATATYPE> dataSource, int requestedSize)
      Construct the view over the given DataSource such that it has requestedSize items.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomSampleDataSource

        public RandomSampleDataSource(DataSource<DATATYPE> dataSource,
                              int requestedSize)
        Construct the view over the given DataSource such that it has requestedSize items.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the dataSource to sample
        requestedSize - the requested number of rows
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the requested size is bigger than the number of rows in the datasource being sampled, or less than one.

      • RandomSampleDataSource

        public RandomSampleDataSource(DataSource<DATATYPE> dataSource,
                              double proportion)
        Construct the view over the given DataSource such that it has the given proportion of items from the original.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - the dataSource to sample
        proportion - the proportion of rows from the original to include in the sample
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the proportion is less than 0 or bigger than 1.
